input_args.passage: 'Michael Standing (footballer) - Wikipedia | Michael John Standing (born 20 March 1981) is an English former professional footballer who played as a midfielder. After terminating his playing career, Standing became an agent for former teammate and long-term friend Gareth Barry until his subsequent retirement from professional football., an English former professional footballer who played as a midfielder'
input_args.claim: 'The citation does not specify that Gareth Barry played as a midfielder for West Bromwich Albion, but it is common knowledge among football fans and easily verifiable.'
